pages.text: If you come across an abandoned house with a few wither skulls and a command block as the core of its body, do not put the last wither skull unless if you want hell for yourself. $(br)$(4)You run the risk of seeing your overworld builds destroyed in its wake.$() $(br2)$(4)You have been warned.$()

Does this bring back memories? If yes, then you know exactly why you should not place that last wither skull. $(br2)Just make sure to kill it at least once before truly investing into your world, or you may choose to avoid it and utilize the detour recipes.
